analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/41/0xcc5f26bf69b259b495a15427384e7f9668917d56.sol:
	Contract VestarinToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/41/0xcc5f26bf69b259b495a15427384e7f9668917d56.sol#180)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
